name: Circles (itch) (mindulle)
description:
8 years-old kid made this game with mom.

Circles can crash each other when they are same number.

And then it can be bigger.

My son enjoy watching how much numbers and circles become bigger.

It is OK just watch.

You can customize options(radius and creation time) at title screen.

(z: start , x: select option, up/down arrow keys: customize option numbers)

At game you can use...

z: crash all the lowest number circles

x: crash two of lowest number circles

modified 2019.11.20

- default creation time decreased, so looks and sounds more speedy
